StnryAssetWaterFtprnt.name: StnryAssetWaterFtprnt
StnryAssetWaterFtprnt.description: Represents information about the total volume of water from the water activities, such as withdrawal, consumption, or discharge that are related to the stationary assets.

CnsmpIntsVariancePct.description: The percentage difference between the water consumption intensity and the previous year water consumption intensity of the water footprint.

DchgIntsVariancePct.description: The percentage difference between the water discharge intensity and the previous year water discharge intensity of the water footprint.

EmployeeCnsmpIntsInM3.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's consumed by each employee.

EmployeeDchgIntsInM3.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's discharged by each employee.

EmployeeWdrwIntsInM3.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's withdrawn by each employee.

EndDate.description: The date when the values of this stationary asset water activity becomes invalid.

ExtremeStressCnsmpPct.description: The percentage of water consumption in the extremely high water stress region.

ExtremeStressWdrwPct.description: The percentage of water withdrawal in the extremely high water stress region.

FlAreaCnsmpIntsInM3M2.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's consumed per square meter (m2) by each floor.

FlAreaCnsmpIntsInM3Sqft.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's consumed per square feet (sqft) by each floor.

FlAreaDchgIntsInM3M2.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's discharged per square meter (m2) by each floor.

FlAreaDchgIntsInM3Sqft.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's consumed per square feet (sqft) by each floor.

FlAreaWdrwIntsInM3M2.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's withdrawn per square meter (m2) by each floor.

FlAreaWdrwIntsInM3Sqft.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's withdrawn per square feet (sqft) by each floor.

FootprintStage.description: Specifies the latest stage in this water footprint life cycle.

HighStressCnsmpPct.description: The percentage of water consumption in the high water stress region.

HighStressWdrwPct.description: The percentage of water withdrawal in the high water stress region.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates whether the stationary asset water footprint record and the associated carbon footprint record is locked for editing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the stationary asset water footprint.

OccupiedFloorArea.description: The building floor area occupied by your organization.

OccupiedFloorAreaUnit.description: The unit of measure for the occupied floor area.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PreviousYearWaterFtprntId.description: The previous year water footprint that's used in calculating the variance of each water activity.

ProdtVolumeCnsmpIntsInM3.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's consumed by each product.

ProdtVolumeDchgIntsInM3.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's discharged by all the products.

ProdtVolumeWdrwIntsInM3.description: The intensity that's calculated in cubic meter (m3) for the water that's withdrawn by all the products manufactured.

ReportingYear.description: The year in which this water footprint record data is due to be sent to a reporting body.

StartDate.description: The date when the values of this stationary asset water activity becomes valid.

StnryAssetEnvrSrcId.description: The stationary asset environmental source associated with this water footprint.

TotalConsumptionInMl.description: The water consumed by all the related water activities.

TotalCost.description: The total cost of this water activity.

TotalDischargeInMl.description: The water discharge by all the related water activities.

TotalFloorArea.description: The total building floor area of your organization.

TotalFloorAreaUnit.description: The unit of measure for the total floor area.

TotalStorageDuringPreviousYear.description: The total water stored during the previous year. This value is measured in cubic meter (m3).

TotalStorageInMl.description: The water reserve available for all the related water activities.

TotalUnitsManufactured.description: The total units manufactured by the associated stationary asset.

TotalWithdrawalInMl.description: The water withdrawal from all the related water activities.

WaterInventoryRecCount.description: The number of energy use records associated with this water footprint record.

WdrwIntsVariancePct.description: The percentage difference between the water withdrawal intensity and the previous year water withdrawal intensity of the water footprint.
